website_summaries.verdict: Designed for the water, this quality training dummy is excellent for play time as well.
pros: Vibrant green or orange color is easy to spot
Available in 2 sizes, small or medium
Floats in water, making it ideal for swim training
Soft materials safe for dog’s mouth, but durable against teeth
Thick rope ideal for throwing and playing tug-of-war
cons: Not designed to withstand prolonged chewing

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality -
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered these before for our lab to use at the lake and been very pleased as they lasted all last summer. Not so much with this order. The green one lasted about 2 days before it fell apart and the orange one had loose stitching from the get-go, but we had no choice but to use it since the green one was already destroyed and no way to replace either one at that point. The orange one lasted only a few hours. While we were frustrated and bummed, the dog was really even more so as this is the highlight of boating for him!
customer_reviews.author: JSMK in West Chester, OH

customer_reviews.title: Guard this toy so your dog won't chew it up.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept however, do not give this to your dog to play with....I say this because mine chewed the blue tip off within 15 minutes of receiving it. If I bought this Toy again, I would keep it and only let the dogs play with it when fetching in the water. That way I would be there to supervise the dog and to make sure she was not chewing on the end. So what I'm saying is that this toy needs and adult chaperone. The toy also arrived dirty. This is what it look like out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Played with this toy for the first time today with my lab. Only played for 30 mins and this is what it looks like. He doesn’t get his water toys to play with when he’s outside of the water so this all happened while playing fetch in the water. Would definitely not recommend. What a waste of money. Have purchased other Chuck It dog toys previously and they have fallen apart right away as well. Not impressed with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzle32

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves this toy.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves fetching this from the water. We used to use the “Wubba Kong” water toy. However, the last time we went to Dog Beach, our youngest dog got very sick from injesting too much salt water. Apparently you’re not supposed to use a ball or ball shaped toy to play fetch in the ocean. When they go to retrieve the ball, saltwater gets in their mouth and the ball shaped toy “plugs up their mouth” so that the water has no place to go, so it gets swallowed. With this toy, the shape allows for the water to run out of their mouths. The bright color allows for it to been easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette McKinley

customer_reviews.title: It did not last
customer_reviews.text: Really liked throwing this for our German Shepard in the pool. He likes to retrieve 25-50 times twice daily for additional exercise. Even though he just sort of mouthed the item, and we never let him have it outside of the pool after about 250 retrieves ( each of about 30 feet) the bottom rubber would fall off. Then the canvas would ride up towards the rope end, and finally a rubber covered spine would fall out of the foam. Got two of them, both done in less than 3 weeks. Great at first, but kind of expensive if I need 3 a month
customer_reviews.author: mdocdoc

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates the water, but for this she happily dives in after it!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the lake or beach. My dog can't resist going after it even though she is not fond of the water or getting wet - she learned to love swimming by chasing this thing. You can see in the picture of my wife tossing the green one that ALL dogs seem to love running out to retrieve this thing! It's easier for the dogs to see, find and grab in the water than a tennis ball. They're well made and hold up to rough play from big dogs. My one issue - at $10 each they're a little pricey and I've already had to replace one that floated off never to be seen again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and the amphibious toy, and this one is by far our favorite. The first one we got was destroyed because our dog found it and shoot it in about five minutes, but we ordered again and are more careful about keeping it away from him unless were playing catch. It works great in the lake and I feel like it’s easier for him to retrieve this then it is the balls. I think he ends up with less water in his mouth by using this toy. The amphibious toy, for the record, should be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: This is for ONE fetch toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item under the impression that it was for a package of 2 fetch toys. The title, image and description made it misleading with how many items you are purchasing. It does look like the purchase options have been updated since my own purchase. As for the toy, it is a great water fetch toy. Would not recommend letting your dog play with it other than fetch as they will be able to chew it apart in .6 seconds as stated in other reviews. It is just dense foam wrapped in neon canvas with a rope attached. Great visibility when throw in the water and the dogs love to go jumping in after it!
customer_reviews.author: dorota

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water toy! Must have for dogs who like to swim
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great. It is highly visible in the water, floats, and even after repeated games of "tug-of-war" there were no puncture marks. Wishing when I ordered two I would've had one green one and one orange one or that they let you choose but the two orange ones do their job just fine. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DogLady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! We used it to play fetch at the lake with our dog. I read from other reviews that it’s not durable for regular chewing, so we only use it for fetch in the water. That helped and it’s still looks new. When we use it, we bring it home and just put it through the washer and let it air dry. Overall, awesome toy!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Our Lab's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This has become our Lab's favorite fetch toy, in or out of the water. Floats high so it's easily seen while swimming. Showing some signs of wear after two months, and I've found one shredded on the shore so we'll see about durability, but the dog likes it and I'll get another when she's trashed this one. Get the orange if you can as it's easier to see than the green in the water.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: For bigger dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 23 lb mini golden doodle to swim after when we are at the lake. Sadly I did not pay close attention to the size & it’s more appropriate for bigger dogs. It’s hard for my dog who has a smaller mouth to easily get in his mouth while he’s swimming. It is definitely well made but I wish I had paid closer Attn to the fact that this is for bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a pup that is addicted to fetch, and fetch in water is even better! They do seem to wear quickly at the seam, but my dog used these for many hours a day over the course of a week at a cabin we rented in the UP. He's like an addict when it comes to his ball and playing fetch. The size seemed to be good for him to hold in his mouth (67 lb dog), probably would not work well for small dogs unless they retrieved it with the piece of rope.
customer_reviews.author: KHutcheison

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This chuckit product didn’t live up to my expectations. Didn’t even last 2 weeks. I typically love my chuckit products, especially their frisbees. But these didn’t last at all. My dogs swim, and I use these to play fetch in the pool. They fetch and retrieve, they don’t tug them. So I’m not sure why they fell apart. I’m disappointed also because I contacted the company along with photos asking for a refund or replacement, and did not get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Only ONE toy, not two.
customer_reviews.text: I love this water toy for my dog. I usually buy from Chewy for much cheaper, but I thought this was a 2 pack as it seems advertised as 2 toys. Had I known it was only 1 I would have stuck with Chewy. I feel as this is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Roun

customer_reviews.title: YOU ONLY GET ONE - MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: You DONT GET TWO this is very misleading and almost cheating. Only one comes or I would have gotten a cheaper deal! Returning. Update: didn’t even last a month, fell apart and the dogs finished it...
customer_reviews.author: Brian James Menendez

customer_reviews.title: False advertising- Only came with 1 instead of 2
customer_reviews.text: Got this expecting it to be a 2 pack because of the picture and description. I feel cheated. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Patrick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: As far as water toys for dogs go these are good however, my dog is a voracious chewer and he destroys them in one afternoon. My smaller dog doesn’t grind on them so they last with her. I have to use them ONLY for water fetch toys and take them off my chewing dog. I’ve bought about 10 of these total.
customer_reviews.author: thimble

customer_reviews.title: great for throwing
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what we wanted it to do. It is super for throwing for our golden retriever to retrieve. We did only have it a little while and the seams have started separating already, it’s not very durable. So we are going to have to replace it and it's too expensive to replace every month.
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

customer_reviews.title: Ad is intentionally deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: Read the whole ad. There is only one toy and not two, as shown in the ad. Ad also shows the color as Multi, suggesting more that one item. No option to pick a color. We could have paid a cheaper price for the same item and been able to select the color.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Finally took these to the beach, totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs lovem, didn't take long tow transition from a ball... definitely floats, bounces.... might cause your dog to eat sand... but so far they seem fine... played with it 4 days in a row running them in the sun for about 1-2 hours at a time... only used the orange one and no wear... and my dog has to try and destroy the toy after retrieving it... but these are lab resistant...
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Best and safest pool throw toy For dogs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best and safest pool throw toy - dogs can’t choke on it because it’s not a round ball or hurt their teeth because it’s cushy and flexible For them to grasp in their mouth . My black lab rates this 5 stars plus - he jumps off the board when I throw it and catches it high in the air. We go through a few every season but great value for such a great pool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for play, not for chewing
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. We only let him have it when we go to the park, if we let him have it at home he would destroy it. He loves it at the dog park, he runs around to every dog there and shows off his toy. He gets quite a few to play tug of war with him. He is a 40 pound pit mix and he has played tug of war with dogs twice his size and it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: David Lebsack

customer_reviews.title: easy to shred
customer_reviews.text: If your dog loves their toy and likes to go A LITTLE (not a lot) crazy at a toy, then this will probably give you 3ish use out of it and that's being very optimistic. The page also makes it look like you're getting two but you're only getting one massive one.
customer_reviews.author: Errrrrka

customer_reviews.title: Can't be without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute favorite toy of my chocolate lab. We use it for fetch when swimming all summer long, and for getting exercise in the yard during our very long winter's in Upper Michigan. She will eventually tear the end off with the rope... We buy a new Chuck-it every 3-4 months, but it is used every day, all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Didnt even last one day
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to buy this for my pups to play with at the beach because they love fetching and swimming. However after 2-3 throws into the water i noticed the stitching begin to come undone and the glue on the end come off and loosen. By the end of our time at the beach, the toy was DESTROYED and no longer functioning... I have two puppies and they don't have the capability to rip apart a toy like this, and I didnt even give them the chance to tear it up. feels like it "melted" when it hit water. would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, weight and visibility
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers are the best! The dogs love retrieving them. Nice size and weight. Easy throwing and very visible on the water. We have 3 and are great for training and just having fun! Not a chew toy! Meant for playing fetch, retrieving stc.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyb

customer_reviews.title: Toy is great.  Advertising is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from my previous purchase link and apparently this is now a single pack instead of a 2 pack. Even though all the pictures show 2 Rather deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Linda Durham

customer_reviews.title: I like these more than my dogs do
customer_reviews.text: They just don’t have good taste and continue to prefer tennis balls. I throw these out into the lake and wait for other dogs to spot them, while mine wait for me to throw a tennis ball. Oh well. Quality product, floats, maybe we will get to a place someday where I can throw them into the water and have confidence they will come back.
customer_reviews.author: Siggygal

customer_reviews.title: Durability leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy these, make sure your dog has ZERO access to the product when you're not actually training. The woven cover is cheap and easily shredded. The end caps are easily torn off. They're soft enough that dogs want to treat them like chew toys and not training bumpers. Spend your money on a solid, one-piece bumper, not these throw-able chew toys.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Valley

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOY!
customer_reviews.text: It floats! My baby LOVES it. She plays so hard with it sometimes she tosses it in the pool and goes to get it herself. I have (2) 50lb boxers and they go nuts for this toy. So glad it came with 2! Probably wouldn’t recommend if your dog is a super chewer tho.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these in pool!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy. It is very well made and we play tug and it stays intact. It will float for days.. doesn’t sink at all. I had to buy two.. it wouldn’t like me purchase just one. Would be nice if they allowed you to purchase a single one as I’m sure it’ll last and the second one is just going to sit.
customer_reviews.author: MAJORTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog has it torn apart in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: It does float nice, it is not meant to be a chew toy. Dog had the outer coating off in a few hours. I bought 2, the first night she brought her new toy to bed. They love it, I just wish the girls didn't destroy items so quickly. Lets see how long the second one lasts. I won't return it...seller won't recognize it!!! $3.00 a day is worth the FUN they had... I would buy it again Nancy
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Call

customer_reviews.title: Seams split open
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if the manufacturer changed something. We have purchased this item several times and the toy will last for several months with our playful Weimar. However, with our most recent 2 purchases, the seams split open within a week. We play fetch and throw in the water; no aggressive chewing. Time to find a new throw toy. 😥
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, when they aren't being stolen by other dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this toy. Sadly, we go through a lot of them as people take home whatever toys their dog's bring back. I ask the dog's owners to bring them back, they never do. I hate snatching a toy from a dog... Anyway, my loves them as long as we own them... They're pretty expensive to be handing out to every dog owner we run into at the park. This price is great, I got several so they should last the whole summer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cattle Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog Doesn't Love It
customer_reviews.text: The product seems alright. My dog likes her other fetch dummies much better though. I also have an issue with the image they use for the product. Makes it look like you are getting two unless you make sure to really read details.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Product written description and photos states two bumpers, only 1 arrived. Customer service closed for 4 days, dog has no toy for the holiday weekend. False advertising
customer_reviews.author: Cure4jen

customer_reviews.title: Designed to be destroyed in no time
customer_reviews.text: I never seen planned obsolescence so clearly. I have products from chuck it that I like but stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Ignacio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Far better than others explained below
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the typical bumpers for a few reasons. First, they can withstand a few minutes of chewing without coming apart like other rubber bumpers ive used in the past. The other reason is the shape. They float high so the dog can see in rough water. They are also flat, channeling water away from the dogs mouth. Other bumpers allow water to go into the dogs mouth (if they're fast swimmers). I will forever be a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest User

customer_reviews.title: Dog’s favorite water toy
customer_reviews.text: This is both our Aussie and Golden’s favorite water toy! Floats well and we can toss extra far with the rope end. We’ve bought a few of these over the years, still our go-to for the lake and the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kate24

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this toy! We only use it at the dog park because if you leave your dog alone to chew it, it will get destroyed! But for water fun she loves it, it was the envy of all the dogs! Every chance they got another dog would try and steal her toy! The design is simple, I don't see the appeal but then again I'm not a dog. There's something about it that draws them too it like a moth to a flame! If your dog loves playing fetch in the water don't hesitate for a second to get this toy! 100% Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Btest729

customer_reviews.title: Stitching fails very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this toy for my dog for the last three years. Over the last year the quality and durability has gone way down. One of these toys used to also my dog a minimum of a month, now I notice the thing falling apart in just a few days. My dog doesn’t chew up or destroy his toys at all but still this thing isn’t holding up like they used to. If it’s the toy quality or maybe my dog all the sudden bites harder I’m looking for a new toy for him. Unfortunate because he absolutely loves these things but spending over $50 a month in toys is getting ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: charles fensch

customer_reviews.title: This toy helped my Rudolph overcome his fear of the pool
customer_reviews.text: Now he swims and jumps in and plays, and he just loves to be in the pool. He was afraid before, but his love of fetching this toy (and carrying it around everywhere) helped him to overcome the fear, and learn to love the pool. He is a heavy chewer, but this toy seems to be surviving the summer quite well. I'm thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for Water, Land and Everywhere Else
customer_reviews.text: My pup LOVES this toy. It floats on the water and throws so much farther than most bumpers. When we get this toy out he just starts to dance with excitement! We have now gone through three of them, however. They aren't super duper tough. The cord is just knotted in the one end- the rope does not go the whole way through the bumper like we had hoped. So too much tug of war or chewing and the rope pops right out. However, we will continue to buy them because these toys work in every situation and with this and a Frisbee, my pup is set.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & durability!
customer_reviews.text: We've been actively using this bumper for several months now and we couldn't be more pleased with the durability and quality. One of our pups is a water dog and she just loves this toy while playing water fetch. It floats, doesn't sink! She even naws on it (very sharp teeth!), testing it's durability and it has held up like nearly new. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mtriple1

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as 2 items - only contains 1
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows 2 items and the head line references 2 items however, there is only 1 float toy. Over priced as you can purchase 1 of these exact toys elsewhere for half of the price listed. Why trick your customer? This makes buying online products just unreliable and undependable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: You only get ONE
customer_reviews.text: You have to ignore the title wording and the photo... only one toy comes in the package. The quality of the dog toy is pretty good, but I could have done a lot better for $16 for a single one.
customer_reviews.author: BrianL71

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn't  ship the entire order. Manufacturer claims its an Amazon problem
customer_reviews.text: item shows you will get 2 carded units if you buy 1 if you order the 2 pack it shows 4 carded units the 4 pack shows 8 carded. You will only receive 1/2 order. Amazon directs you to contact manufacturer. The manufacturer emailed me and said its an Amazon problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cohen

customer_reviews.title: No color choice
customer_reviews.text: Color: I was hoping to get at least one orange one for visibility in the water, but we received two green colored ones in the two pack. Our 35 lb dog is a chewer, and left alone with this, it didn't take her long to destroy one (lesson learned). But, they float and are easy to throw, so it will do.
customer_reviews.author: H2O

customer_reviews.title: golden loves this
customer_reviews.text: picked this up for the pool and beach for the dogger. he loves it and its nice and durable (he chews most toys to shreds) this has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: fell apart in two days
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product!! My dogs retrieved this item from the pool approximately 20-30 times The stitching started to wear almost immediately Not very durable!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin viele

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We spent 4 hours on the lake today and both of our dogs fully enjoyed this toy! They played fetch for hours!! It was a short day and they didn’t chew on it but, no damage yet. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for lake!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My lab loved it. Took off one star because she easily chewed parts of it off. But a lab is probably the hardest chewer so to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: AHC Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Change up from Tennis Balls
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retrievers love these! We bought one for each, though as seen in the photo they tend to always want the same one!! Great price and seems very sturdy so far!!
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great if dog loves fetch
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love playing fetch with these. He loves them so much he has worn them out. The nylon cover stitching started to come undone, and the cover started to shred. I will purchase new ones soon.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Barry

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoyed though not durable
customer_reviews.text: This was our dog’s favorite toy, for 4 days until it fell apart. She is a 48 pound husky/GSD mix so either she is a beast or the toy isn’t as durable as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up like we expected. Our dogs chewed it up quickly. The good thing is it floats well and is very visible in the water. Just not great for chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shipe

customer_reviews.title: Chewed to Shreds in 10 days! Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My 17 week old Lab chewed it to pieces in 10 days. Terrible product for young retrievers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Will but again. Decent price, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Would be good for most but I’ll have to wait to see how they do with my pups. Quality seems good and tough. With Rottweilers nothing last very long
customer_reviews.author: Madeline A Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not for German Shepherds
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 yo german shepherd loved this toy, but unfortunately, she destroyed it in 2 days. Did not hold up well to the jaws of a shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Ms NBA

customer_reviews.title: no size or color choice option when ordering
customer_reviews.text: item name says assorted sizes and colors but there is no choice to choose a size or color! received the medium, which is too big for my dog. cannot attest for durability but toy looks sturdy enough for water play, not as chew toy

customer_reviews.title: Most Durable Dog Toy I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yellow Lab 5 month old puppy who is a voracious chewer and it took him months to even begin to shred this toy in our pool. Most other so called durable dog toys I've bought last him anywhere from 20 min. to a week. I will be replacing this one shortly and I usually find that a truly indestructible toys are ignored by my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these toys to come in. Unfortunately BOTH tore at the ends in less than a month. The quality is disappointing and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ad
customer_reviews.text: The ad said two sizes but did not allow to select sizes so I assumed I was receiving two different size items. Instead I received 1 large chuckit. As is very deceiving. I have a small dog therefore I wish to return item
customer_reviews.author: David Fiez

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy. It's easy to throw it a nice distance without killing your arm. It's bright and easy to see. And it floats! That makes this a go to toy. We take one everywhere with us. One got left in the yard and the mower got it, but it is still usable!
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyTree

customer_reviews.title: Dog destroyed in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: My lab completely destroyed this toy within a few minutes. And that was just playing fetch!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I tried to keep my dog from chewing on it but even just playing fetch it didn't last more than 2-3 sessions playing fetch in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: luca

customer_reviews.title: A favorite retrieving toy.
customer_reviews.text: Although my dog is a bit rough on these bumpers it is definitely her favorite pool toy. She loves to retrieve from the pool. They do eventually unravel and separate. We go through about 4 during the summer season.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyann J.

customer_reviews.title: Read full description or you will be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed 😞 by the size and that the picture shows 2. I ordered in a hurry to receive it on time. I expected it to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Quiana Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool. Great colors for the dogs and havent faded. They held up for for a couple months with my big dogs but stiching is beginning to loosen. Hoping it stays together
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: all of my dogs go crazy for it. they love it. its a big hit at the dog beach. they will play fetch with it for hours super durable
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a water toy for my Doberman. We used it once at the pool, and only for retrieving, not for chewing, and the seam began to split. My daughter was with, and said she had a similar experience with her labs with the same toy, seams split.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne G Brettschneider

customer_reviews.title: A very durable dog toy
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great at the farm & beach with our lab. I felt like the advertisement was a bit misleading - you get one NOT two.
customer_reviews.author: valtown

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, but my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple of weeks, it has split along the seam already. Hopefully the replacement we ordered will hold up better, because this is our six month old pups favorite fetch toy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O

customer_reviews.title: Just 1 Bumper
customer_reviews.text: I love the product its just the posting is a little deceiving since its just for one bumper, not 2 as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Beach Goers!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy packs a huge punch, and my Australian Shepherd loves it! Although he was able to tear off the attached rope for throwing within the first month, the bumper has remained intact since purchasing six months ago. With the right throw you can really launch this thing, up to a few hundred feet, and it floats! The rubber ends are great to assist with the throw, and offer durability when landing on hard surfaces. Definitely recommend for the beach or park lover.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Z

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 5 hours... Not for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a 100lb German Shepherd, I went to the beach and played fetch with him in the water. At first the toy looked fantastic and durable. Unfortunately, it did not last 5 hours. The cover came off and we played with the foam for a while. He has a strong bite but I would've hoped that it would lasted more than a few hours. I give it two stars because it worked great before it fell apart. I think this would be a great toy for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Our girl loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our girl loves these. Easy for her to retrieve. But not meant to be used as chew toy. She’s only allowed to play with these during water time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Miklos

customer_reviews.title: Taught my dog how to fetch with this
customer_reviews.text: I have a golden retriever who wasn’t interested in fetch until I started throwing this in the ocean. He’s now obsessed, and can’t get enough of this toy. The bright orange is great because he can easily see it in the ocean, even with the waves. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a short time
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these toys, they are great for water because they float. But within minutes both were ripped apart. The plastic part with the rope easily comes off the bottom. Will find something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great toy dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We buy these toys a lot. Chuck it makes great toys there my dogs favorite when they go swimming floats great! Easy to see with the bright colors. Only reason didn’t give a 5 on durability is that if I leave them with my Pitts to long not throwing them they start to tear them up. Just means there really put to the test 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jordan way

customer_reviews.title: Chuckit! for the craziest of pool going dogs! Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bomber the Dog eats all of his toys in about... 30 seconds. EXCEPT FOR THE CHUCKIT! This thing is the bomb.com!!!e can't get through it. He's an 85v pound crazy man golden retriever and his persistance has not paid off! It's not entirely indestructible, I am basing this review on all of the other pool toys he's destroyed in under 30 seconds. It floats, it chucks, it's green and blue. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of Bomber the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved fetching this toy! We used it almost every day but recently she got protective with it and ran off and ended up chewing it so now it's falling apart. Great fetch toy if your dog loves to run. Nice rope to be able to throw it far. Highly recommend if you can keep your dog from gnawing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Underthesamebluesky

customer_reviews.title: Loved by terriers and coyotes alike!
customer_reviews.text: While my Welsh Terrier loved playing fetch and tug of war with this, it met an early demise. Not from my terrier, but we live adjacent to an open trail area that is a highway for coyotes at night. One night we left this in the yard by mistake and the next morning it was laying in the open area on the other side of our split rail fence with the rope chewed in half. Apparently this item is also enjoyed by coyotes. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: No longer a good quality water toy.
customer_reviews.text: These use to be a quality dog toy as I have purchased them in the past and they use to last for quite awhile. Unfortunately the last two that I ordered here on Amazon have fallen apart by splitting at the seams very quickly. I would recommend another water toy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Was great, while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It's 'Ok', for awhile. It floats on top of the water. It can be tossed a long distance. It's easy for dogs to grab. It doesn't get soggy. However, the fabric wrapping the thing, will easily unravel thread by tread. My Border Collie chomps on it as he swims back to shore and it was enough to puncture some holes in the fabric, the seam let loose, and in a short time it fell completely apart. It was only used for water retrieve as intended and didn't last but a dozen swim sessions. I won't purchase again. We'll stick to Kong's Wubbas.
customer_reviews.author: Rodez

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves this. I got it to use in water and she likes that too, but also enjoys just running around with it and chewing it. Best part is it has held up REALLY WELL to a detail oriented power chewer. Yes, that's totally a thing and you know if you have one. It's also 50% cheaper here on Amazon than in Petco, which is why I got it here after seeing it there.
customer_reviews.author: D.Nuttz

customer_reviews.title: Floats but Can't Sustain a Chewer
customer_reviews.text: It did float and colors were fun, but my lab ate it to pieces in between throws and "drop it". It only lasted a week. Probably great if you don't have a chewer. My lab is 7 months old and still learning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue ends a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful that this would be a good toy for my medium sized dog. I got it because the Chuckit! Balls are indestructible. However, on this the blue ends are just too easy to chew off. Within 2 minutes he was already chewing pieces away. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnae H

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for water fetch!
customer_reviews.text: Another chuckit toy that somewhat meets expectations, I do not let my dog chew on this, as this is a pool / lake toy only. As previous chuckit toys she has torn apart like the chuckit zipflight (she likes them and they do float well but my dog rips them apart in minutes). This toy is great if your looking for a toy to play fetch with in water. Reason for 4 stars is my dog was easily able to chew the rope off in minutes
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Dog loves them. Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and dog loves it. I thought I would get 1 orange and 1 green but only got 2 green. It does say colors can vary.
customer_reviews.author: Chaille Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We discovered this in the summer - someone at the local lake had one and our dog kept taking it to play. So I bought her one of her own. She loves to play tug with it. And will sometimes chase and play fetch with it. But tug remains the best game with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great water toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy! Pros: *Bright color (ours is orange) for good visibility *Floats high enough that my dog was able to see this in the water while swimming so she could find it *Lightweight, making it easy to throw it a good distance Cons: *Not really washable, so the fabric and plastic rope seem to get a bit cruddy *Not super durable. If your dog is a chewer, make sure you don't give them free access to this toy. This is the kind of toy that is best used only for supervised retrieving.
customer_reviews.author: The Haynals

customer_reviews.title: Brightly colored. Floats well. Easy to retrieve.
customer_reviews.text: Chuck-it toys are expensive locally. This one has already been thrown n the lake several times & floats well. The rope makes it easy to throw. Bright colors are easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Transgender World 101

customer_reviews.title: This is great for tossing in the pond for the dogs to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for tossing in the pond for the dogs to fetch. The only thing is you really can not let them play with it. At least I couldn't let my dogs play with it. I should have only kept it for water retrieval as it is intended for. My dogs tugged on it and pulled one end off. Again not the fault of the toy. It isn't made for that. It is great for water retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good swimming toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a natural swimmer and surfer. He loves retrieving this bumper from the water. Unlike those small tennis balls, It is big enough for him to see from far away. If you hold the end of the string and spin it really fast and then throw it out, it’ll travel far away.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Dog's favorite lake toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the time of his life playing with this in the lake. It is perfect. Durable, bright & floats.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not a chew toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog had it torn apart in 2 minutes. This is not designed to be a chew toy. If I rated it just on being a retriever toy I would give it a 4 or 5
customer_reviews.author: Catherine D

customer_reviews.title: Floats great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the visibility. Floats great. It floats so well it floated away before I could really get to see how my dog liked it. :-( no fault of Chuckit! I got distracted and my dog was tired of being in the water. I actually think it would have worked out well because of the rope part. My dog doesn't like to open his mouth wide in the water because he doesn't like to get water in his mouth. The rope would be easier for him to grab. I will probably buy another one just to see if he likes it better than the Duck Diver.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever LOVES this! Inside the pool or out, she jumps up to where we leave it when not in play. One of her favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Breslin

product_meta.title: Chuckit! Amphibious Bumper Fetch and Float Toy 2 Sizes Assorted Colors
product_meta.description: The Chuckit! Amphibious Bumper is the ideal fetching, floating toy for water-loving dogs. Featuring a buoyant memory foam and rubber construction, this floating dog toy allows exciting games of fetch by the pool or on the beach. The knotted, non-slip rope handle allows pet parents to keep a firm grip and easily direct throws during fetch. Durable for outdoor play, the rubber and foam construction withstands repeated throwing and catching for long-term use. The dog fetch toy's soft nylon exterior is gentle on dogs' mouths for comfortable catching and carrying. Designed with bright orange and blue colors, both pets and pet parents can easily spot the bumper dog toy in tall grass or on water, making the bumper an excellent addition to your dog water toys. Available in small and medium sizes, a wide range of dogs can enjoy fetch with the versatile Chuckit! Tri-Bumper
feature_bullets: DOG WATER FETCH TOY: This colorful bumper chew toy is designed with lightweight memory foam for fetching fun at the pool, beach or lake. The bumper rope toy is knotted for a secure grip.
SOFT & DURABLE: The water dog toy is made of nylon, rubber & EVA foam that's soft on dog's gums & teeth. The fetch toy also withstands aggressive chewing. Easy to clean & wash off.

PET TOYS: Get ready for bonding & fun with your dogs & cats! Check out a variety of our pet toy products such as frisbees, perches & mirrors for birds, prey wand toys for cats, plush toys, light-up interactive toys & more.

CHUCKIT! FETCH TOYS: Chuckit! creates toys that enrich the human-animal bond & bright colors help dogs & puppies stay engaged. Checkout Chuckit! for ball launchers, bouncy balls, frisbees, indoor dog toys, glow toys & more!

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
